name: Pick Up The Waste
description:
The purchase of Pick Up The Waste gives you access to 20 levels in which you have to manage to throw a certain amount of waste in the trash can.

Mimi the cat's paw sweeps the screen from left to right and back again. Click on the paw in the bottom right corner to drop the waste that appears in the frame at the top of the screen into the trash can.

You will have to succeed in piling up various waste that will follow one another to win the game. If you exceed the level's objective, you can move on to the next level.

Trigger the bonuses that will give you the opportunity to recycle some of the garbage so you can always pile up more.
